content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SVPRESP
      operator: empty
    - name: VISITDY
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000035
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when SVPRESP is null and VISITDY is not null.
Outcome:
  Message: VISITDY is populated when SVPRESP is null.  VISITDY is the Planned Study
    Day of a visit. It should not be populated for unplanned visits.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0658
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: VISITDY is the Planned Study Day of a visit. It should
                  not be populated for unplanned visits.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: '5.5'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SV

json.Description: Raise an error when SVPRESP is null and VISITDY is not null.

Outcome.Message: VISITDY is populated when SVPRESP is null.  VISITDY is the Planned Study Day of a visit. It should not be populated for unplanned visits.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: VISITDY is the Planned Study Day of a visit. It should not be populated for unplanned visits.
